text: REFUND POLICY Effective Date: January 1, 2024 General Refund Terms We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all products purchased through our platform. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you may request a full refund within 30 days of the purchase date. Eligibility Criteria To be eligible for a refund: - The product must be returned in its original condition - The refund request must be submitted within 30 days of purchase - Proof of purchase (receipt or order number) must be provided - Digital products must not have been downloaded more than twice Non-Refundable Items The following items are not eligible for refunds: - Gift cards - Downloadable software after activation - Custom-made or personalized items - Sale items marked as "final sale" - Services that have been fully rendered Refund Processing Time Once we receive and inspect your return: - Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days - The refund will be credited to your original payment method - It may take an additional 3-5 business days for the refund to appear in your account Partial Refunds Partial refunds may be granted in the following situations: - Items showing signs of use or wear - Items missing original packaging - Items returned after 30 days but within 60 days (50% refund) Shipping Costs - Original shipping costs are non-refundable - Return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer - If the return is due to our error, we will cover return shipping costs Contact Information For refund inquiries, contact our customer service team: Email: refunds@company.com Phone: 1-800-REFUNDS Hours: Monday-Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM EST
